channel.title: Missing textures
channel.description: So i got black mesa and most of the textures are missing. in the main menu everything seems to be fine, but when i start a new game almost all of them are missing. i have tried verifying game cache and i installed half life 2 (but not episode 1/2) i have no mod installed and i don't know what to do[attach=4409,none,1440][/attach] ![LUMP.jpg|690x500](upload://ym2sKXajAZ0MPEskK93woU7ZkeE.jpeg)

item.title: Missing textures
item.dc:creator: Kepernakiz
item.description:
the game says im running dx9 when i check, and if it helps im also running windows 10.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing textures
item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
By any chance, are you playing on DirectX 8 or so?

That’s the only time when I’ve ever seen something like this, since it’s not supported by the game. Or by quick-loading custom maps.

If you’re not playing on DX8, try verifying game’s integrity in Steam - Black Mesa - Properties and disable all the mods (if you use any), then start a new game.

Also installing any of the HL games is useless, BM has it’s own files and not using any other. Only the mod version uses SDK Base 2007.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing textures
item.dc:creator: Kepernakiz
item.description:
So i got black mesa and most of the textures are missing. in the main menu everything seems to be fine, but when i start a new game almost all of them are missing. i have tried verifying game cache and i installed half life 2 (but not episode 1/2) i have no mod installed and i don’t know what to do[attach=4409,none,1440][/attach]
